title: PM Modi Congratulates Keir Starmer For Win, Has A Message For Rishi Sunak
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today congratulated Labour leader Keir Starmer on winning the UK elections and said he was looking forward to a positive collaboration to strengthen India-UK ties.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today congratulated Labour leader Keir Starmer on winning the UK elections and said he was looking forward to a positive collaboration to strengthen India-UK ties.

title: Nestle's French Unit Faces Charges In Pizza Contamination Case
content: Nestle's French subsidiary has been charged in a case involving contaminated pizzas that are suspected of having led to the death of two children, the company said Friday.
summary: Nestle's French subsidiary has been charged in a case involving contaminated pizzas that are suspected of having led to the death of two children, the company said Friday.

title: How Much Does A UK Prime Minister Earn? A Breakdown Of Perks And Benefits
content: The job of a PM has never been astronomically well-paid compared with other professions of similar responsibility.
summary: The job of a PM has never been astronomically well-paid compared with other professions of similar responsibility.

title: UK Labour's Landslide Election Victory Lifts European Stock Markets
content: Europe's stock markets rose in opening deals on Friday as investors digested news that Labour, as expected, clinched a landslide election victory in Britain to end 14 years of Conservative rule.
summary: Europe's stock markets rose in opening deals on Friday as investors digested news that Labour, as expected, clinched a landslide election victory in Britain to end 14 years of Conservative rule.

title: Keir Starmer Reflects On Labour's Remarkable Journey to Victory
content: On the eve of polls opening in the UK general election, Keir Starmer allowed himself a moment to reflect on how far he had come since he became leader of the Labour Party four-and-a-half years ago.
summary: On the eve of polls opening in the UK general election, Keir Starmer allowed himself a moment to reflect on how far he had come since he became leader of the Labour Party four-and-a-half years ago.

title: Labour Party Ends Conservative Era: Key Moments Of Conservative Rule In UK
content: Britain's Labour Party won a parliamentary election on Friday, bringing to an end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government that saw the country weather one of the more turbulent periods in its post-World War Two political history.
summary: Britain's Labour Party won a parliamentary election on Friday, bringing to an end 14 years of Conservative Party-led government that saw the country weather one of the more turbulent periods in its post-World War Two political history.

title: UK Says No To AI. Virtual Candidate Finishes Last In Polls
content: AI Steve was designed to engage with voters in real time on various issues and offer policy ideas. It could handle up to 10,000 conversations simultaneously.
summary: AI Steve was designed to engage with voters in real time on various issues and offer policy ideas. It could handle up to 10,000 conversations simultaneously.

title: Opinion: UK Elections: Mending India-Labour Relations Won't Be Easy For Starmer
content: The relations between the UK's Labour Party and the Indian government are complex, influenced by historical ties, diaspora politics, and divergent policy priorities. Addressing such challenges will require nuanced diplomacy.
summary: The relations between the UK's Labour Party and the Indian government are complex, influenced by historical ties, diaspora politics, and divergent policy priorities. Addressing such challenges will require nuanced diplomacy.

title: Co-Flier Recalls "Innocent Face" Of Indian-Origin Woman Who Died Mid-Flight
content: Manpreet Kaur was studying in Melbourne and wanted to become a chef. Her body cannot leave Australia because she died from tuberculosis.
summary: Manpreet Kaur was studying in Melbourne and wanted to become a chef. Her body cannot leave Australia because she died from tuberculosis.

title: Labour Dominates Scotland, Scottish National Party Suffers Major Setback
content: Scotland's pro-separatist Scottish National Party was virtually wiped out at the UK general election on Friday, suffering a devastating blow to its withering independence movement.
summary: Scotland's pro-separatist Scottish National Party was virtually wiped out at the UK general election on Friday, suffering a devastating blow to its withering independence movement.

title: Suella Braverman, Satvir Kaur Among Indian-Origin Leaders Who Won In UK Poll

title: Greece Will Now Work 6 Days A Week, Labour Unions Call It "Barbaric"
content: As more European countries move towards a shorter, 4-day working week, workers in Greece will have to work for six days every week in a new government initiative aimed at boosting productivity and employment across the nation.
summary: As more European countries move towards a shorter, 4-day working week, workers in Greece will have to work for six days every week in a new government initiative aimed at boosting productivity and employment across the nation.

title: Suella Braverman, Under Fire For Immigration Remarks, Wins In UK Polls
content: Former Home Secretary Suella Braverman won the newly-created Fareham and Waterlooville constituency in the 2024 UK general election.
summary: Former Home Secretary Suella Braverman won the newly-created Fareham and Waterlooville constituency in the 2024 UK general election.

title: Keir Starmer, Set To Be Next UK PM, Changed Party's Stance On Kashmir
content: One of the first challenges for Keir Starmer as the UK Prime Minister will be to restore the Labour Party's ties with India, which has been tumultuous due to their remarks on Kashmir. Starmer led the party to a landslide win.
summary: One of the first challenges for Keir Starmer as the UK Prime Minister will be to restore the Labour Party's ties with India, which has been tumultuous due to their remarks on Kashmir. Starmer led the party to a landslide win.

title: Count Binface, The "Intergalactic Space Warrior" Who Took On Rishi Sunak
content: Count Binface, the self-proclaimed "intergalactic space warrior," who contested against Rishi Sunak from the Richmond parliamentary seat in the UK general elections, celebrated his personal best in his fledgling political career: a 6th place finish.
summary: Count Binface, the self-proclaimed "intergalactic space warrior," who contested against Rishi Sunak from the Richmond parliamentary seat in the UK general elections, celebrated his personal best in his fledgling political career: a 6th place finish.

title: Ryanair Airlines Offers "A Seat" To Outgoing UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak
content: Taking a swipe at Rishi Sunak, whose party has lost the UK election, European Airlines Ryanair said in a post on X that they have got a "seat" for the outgoing British Prime Minister.
summary: Taking a swipe at Rishi Sunak, whose party has lost the UK election, European Airlines Ryanair said in a post on X that they have got a "seat" for the outgoing British Prime Minister.

title: Taiwan Urges China To Avoid Escalation Amid Renewed Military Activity
content: Taiwan on Friday reported renewed Chinese military activity nearby with another "combat patrol" as the government called on Beijing not to escalate tensions after the seizure of a Taiwanese fishing boat.
summary: Taiwan on Friday reported renewed Chinese military activity nearby with another "combat patrol" as the government called on Beijing not to escalate tensions after the seizure of a Taiwanese fishing boat.

title: "UK Gets Its Future Back": Labour's Keir Starmer In Victory Speech
content: Labour's Sir Keir Starmer delivered a storming victory speech Friday morning after the party swept the UK general election, declaring the country "gets its future back after 14 years (of a Conservative Party government)".
summary: Labour's Sir Keir Starmer delivered a storming victory speech Friday morning after the party swept the UK general election, declaring the country "gets its future back after 14 years (of a Conservative Party government)".

title: "I Am Sorry": UK PM Rishi Sunak Concedes Defeat In UK Polls
content: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has conceded defeat in the country's general elections as the trends showed that the Opposition Labour Party had won over 300 seats, while Sunak's Conservative Party is ahead on 61.
summary: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has conceded defeat in the country's general elections as the trends showed that the Opposition Labour Party had won over 300 seats, while Sunak's Conservative Party is ahead on 61.

title: Keir Starmer To Be Next UK PM: What This Means For India
content: Labour Party chief Keir Starmer is on course to replace Rishi Sunak as the Britain Prime Minister, with early election results pointing at a crushing loss for the Conservatives.
summary: Labour Party chief Keir Starmer is on course to replace Rishi Sunak as the Britain Prime Minister, with early election results pointing at a crushing loss for the Conservatives.
